summary: Play a game while loading a game!
descriptionHtml:
Play a game while loading a game! This is obviously not for people with SSD drives or super fast computers, but while travelling through Skyrim you\'ll encounter lots of loading screens. This will make loading a little more fun! Use spacebar to start and shoot, arrow keys to move. No gamepad support yet!

## Installation ##

Place \'loadingmenu.swf\' in [Skyrim installation folder]/Data/Interface

## Uninstallation ##

Simply remove the file!

---

Enjoy :)

Mod by:
Kenney Vleugels
www.kenney.nl
author: Kenney
